FuncDef: This command configures the MAC Filter Policy sub-type as being either normal, ISID or VID.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies which type of entry this MAC filter can contain. Values-normal - regular match criteria are allowed; ISID or VID filter match criteria not allowed
isid - only ISID match criteria are allowed
vid - only VID match criteria are allowed on ethernet_II frame types.
